tags.Description: Allow traffic from container to container inside ecs cluster

tags_all.Description: Allow traffic from container to container inside ecs cluster

tags.Description: Allow traffic from load balancer to fargate containers

tags_all.Description: Allow traffic from load balancer to fargate containers

values.description: App Mesh Envoy policy for accessing Virtual Node configuration.
values.name: AWSAppMeshEnvoyAccess

values.description: Allow the AWS X-Ray Daemon to relay raw trace segments data to the service's API and retrieve sampling data (rules, targets, etc.) to be used by the X-Ray SDK.
values.name: AWSXRayDaemonWriteAccess

values.description: Provides access to other AWS service resources that are required to run Amazon ECS tasks
values.name: AmazonECSTaskExecutionRolePolicy

values.description: Provides full access to CloudWatch Logs
values.name: CloudWatchLogsFullAccess

balancer_dns_url.description: The URL of the external load balancer

app_name.description: Target application name, the default value is 'aws-conciergeapp-stack'

app_server_cpu.description: CPU required for the authorization server/service container, 1024 is used as default

app_server_desired_count.description: How many copies of the service task to run, 1' is used as default

app_server_health_interval.description: Interval in seconds to check health path for the authorization server/service, 60 is used as default

app_server_health_path.description:
"Health path for the authorization server/service, '/app/health' is used as default.
 Use a different base path for different microservices, those paths are used to route the traffic
 if the microservices are behind of a load balancer with different target groups."

app_server_health_protocol.description: Protocol health check for the authorization server/service, 'HTTP' is used as default

app_server_image_url.description: URL to use to pull image for the authorization server/service

app_server_max_capacity.description: Maximum number of copies of the service task to run, 5' is used as default

app_server_memory.description: Memory required for the authorization server/service container, 2048 is used as default

app_server_name.description: The name for the authorization server/service, 'app-server' is used as default

app_server_path_pattern.description:
"Path pattern to forward traffic from load balancer to authorization server/service target group,
'/app/*' is used as default value"

app_server_port.description: Default port for the authorization server/service, 8080 is used as default

app_server_protocol.description: Protocol for the authorization server/service, 'HTTP' is used as default

app_server_rule_priority.description:
"The priority for the routing rule added to the load balancer.
This only applies if your have multiple services which have been assigned to different paths on the load balancer"

auth_server_cpu.description: CPU required for the authorization server/service container, 1024 is used as default

auth_server_desired_count.description: How many copies of the service task to run, 1' is used as default

auth_server_health_interval.description: Interval in seconds to check health path for the authorization server/service, 60 is used as default

auth_server_health_path.description: Health path for the authorization server/service, '/auth/realms/concierge/' is used as default

auth_server_health_protocol.description: Protocol health check for the authorization server/service, 'HTTP' is used as default

auth_server_image_url.description: URL to use to pull image for the authorization server/service

auth_server_max_capacity.description: Maximum number of copies of the service task to run, 1' is used as default

auth_server_memory.description: Memory required for the authorization server/service container, 2048 is used as default

auth_server_name.description: The name for the authorization server/service, 'auth-server' is used as default

auth_server_path_pattern.description:
"Path pattern to forward traffic from load balancer to authorization server/service target group,
'/auth/*' is used as default value"

auth_server_port.description: Default port for the authorization server/service, 8080 is used as default

auth_server_protocol.description: Protocol for the authorization server/service, 'HTTP' is used as default

auth_server_rule_priority.description:
"The priority for the routing rule added to the load balancer.
This only applies if your have multiple services which have been assigned to different paths on the load balancer"

cluster_name.description: The name of the ECS cluster

containers_security_group_id.description: A security group used to allow Fargate containers to receive traffic

default_lb_listener_arn.description: The ARN of the default lister of load balancer

default_tags.description: Default tags to add to all resources created inside of this module

domain_dns_url.description: Domain URL created by network stack

environment.description: Environment name to use the resources

region_name.description: Region name where where deploy network resources

subnet_ids.description: Ids for all subnets created/used by network stack

task_execution_role_arn.description: The ARN of the ECS task execution role

task_role_arn.description: The ARN of the ECS role, default to an empty string

vpc_id.description: The ID of the vpc that this stack is deployed on

balancer_dns_url.description: The URL of the external load balancer

cluster_name.description: The name of the ECS cluster

containers_security_group_id.description: A security group used to allow Fargate containers to receive traffic

default_lb_listener_arn.description: The ARN of the public load balancer's listener

region_name.description: Current region name to deploy network stack

subnet_ids.description: Ids for all subnets used for the network stack

task_execution_role_arn.description: The ARN of the ECS task execution role

task_role_arn.description: The ARN of the IAM role

vpc_id.description: The ID of the vpc that this stack is deployed on

app_name.description: Target application name, the default value is 'aws-network-stack'

default_tags.description: Default tags to add to all resources created inside of this module

environment.description: Environment name to use the resources

hosted_zone.description: Hosted Zone to use to create the alias to reach out it through a DNS, this must be created beforehand
